The World Health Organisation is advising people to follow five simple steps to help prevent the spread of COVID-19:

1. Wash your hands
2. Cough/sneeze into your elbow
3. Don't touch your face
4. Stay more than 3ft (1m) away from others
5. Stay home if you feel sick
